entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
